recipe.title: Cinnamon Orange Black Tea Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ cups ; black tea leaves ; (100 g)
½ cup ; orange peel, dried ; (140 g)

steps.step: Combine the black tea, orange peel, and cinnamon. Store in an airtight container for up to 1 month.
To brew, steep 1-2 teaspoons of the tea blend in 8 ounces (240 ml) of hot water for 5 minutes. Serve warm or over ice.
